General.Name: Omega Energia S.A.
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Omega Energia S.A. generates and sells renewable energy. It generates through electricity through wind, water, and solar sources. As of December 31, 2021, the company operated 79 projects with a total installed capacity of 1,863.2 megawatts. The company was formerly known as Omega Geração S.A. and changed its name to Omega Energia S.A. in December 2021. Omega Energia S.A. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Elvira Ferraz, nº 68, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04552-040
